knimeNode.name: openBIS Data Set Registration
knimeNode.shortDescription: Registers a file as a data set on an openBIS instance.

fullDescription.intro:
The URI input port specifies the location of the file to be registered. The owner of the freshly registered data set is specified by a variable.
For more details see openBIS KNIME Nodes.

ports.inPort: URI of the file to be registered.
